  note = {The {JISC-funded} Memetic{\textless}sup{\textgreater}2{\textless}/sup{\textgreater} project was designed as knowledge management and project memory support for teams meeting via the Access Grid environment {(Buckingham} Shum et al, 2006). This paper describes how these capabilities also enable it to serve as a novel distributed video analysis tool to support interaction analysis. Memetic technologies can be used to record, annotate and discuss sessions recorded within a flexible, visual hypermedia environment called Compendium. We propose that beyond the use originally conceived, the Memetic toolset could find wide ranging applications within social science for virtual ethnography and data analysis.},
